DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study evaluate clinical outcome different cataract surgical technique lens fragmentation subject undergoing routine cataract surgery .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Clinical Outcomes Surgical Phaco Segmentation Techniques Patients Undergoing Cataract Surgery
DOC.criteria: 1 . Able understand study requirement , willing follow study instruction willing return require study followup visit confirm provision write informed consent . 2 . Subjects visually significant cataract schedule undergo cataract surgery 3 . Subjects > 18 year age 4 . BCVA baseline well 20/40 5 . Grade 1+ cataract 1 .
